allowlist.description: safe GraphQL operations - when allow lists are enabled only these operations are allowed

cron_triggers.description: reliably trigger HTTP endpoints to run custom business logic periodically based on a cron schedule

max_export_batch_size.description: The maximum batch size of every export. It must be smaller or equal to maxQueueSize (not yet configurable). Default 512.

headers.description: Key-value pairs to be used as headers to send with an export request.

otlp_logs_endpoint.description: Target URL to which the exporter is going to send logs. No default.

otlp_metrics_endpoint.description: Target URL to which the exporter is going to send metrics. No default.

otlp_traces_endpoint.description: Target URL to which the exporter is going to send traces. No default.

protocol.description:
The transport protocol
Possible protocol to use with OTLP. Currently, only http/protobuf is supported.

resource_attributes.description: Attributes to send as the resource attributes of an export request. We currently only support string-valued attributes.

traces_propagators.description: List of propagators to inject and extract traces data from headers.

items.description: Possible trace propagators to use with OTLP

OtelNameValue.description: Internal helper type for JSON lists of key-value pairs

connection_set.description:
connection set used for connection template (supported only for cloud/enterprise edition)
PostgresConnectionSet

read_replicas.description: Optional list of read replica configuration (supported only in cloud/enterprise versions)

Postgres Scalar Types

connection_lifetime.description: Time from connection creation after which the connection should be destroyed and a new one created. A value of 0 indicates we should never destroy an active connection. If 0 is passed, memory from large query results may not be reclaimed. (default: 600 sec)

idle_timeout.description: The idle timeout (in seconds) per connection (default: 180)

max_connections.description: Maximum number of connections to be kept in the pool (default: 50)

pool_timeout.description: Maximum time to wait while acquiring a Postgres connection from the pool, in seconds (default: forever)

total_max_connections.description: Total maximum number of connections across all instances (cloud only, default: null)

database_url.description: The database connection URL as a string, from an environment variable, as connection parameters, or dynamically read from a file at connect time.

use_prepared_statements.description: If set to true the server prepares statement before executing on the source database (default: false). For more details, refer to the Postgres docs

PostgresStoredProcedureMetadata.description: A stored procedure as represented in metadata.

arguments.description: Free variables in the expression and their types

description.description: A description of the stored procedure which appears in the graphql schema

stored_procedure.description: The name of the SQL stored procedure

unique_params.description: This would be either fixed value "IP" or a list of Session variables

RemoteArguments.description: Remote arguments are represented by an object that maps each argument name to its value.

RemoteFields.description: Remote fields are represented by an object that maps each field name to its arguments.
